abstracts.cdata!:
The project's main objective is to
            improve the efficiency of the Government's investment
            machinery while expanding the pipeline of projects for
            Ecuador's investment program. It provides for
            preinvestment studies of investments in agro-industries,
            other industries, power, agriculture, urban development and
            water supply. The project also includes technical assistance
            for advising and training FONAPRE's staff and that of
            other public agencies in project preparation and management;
            and assisting local consulting firms. There are no special
            risks involved in the project. The principal difficulty will
            be recruiting suitable experts and obtaining effective
            coordination with the local staff.
